content: Welcome to the **SMH OUR HEADS** Discord server!

embed.title: About SMH OUR HEADS
embed.description: SMH OUR HEADS is a weekly podcast created and recorded by the youth of ACT4Christ Youth/College Ministries at CCCTO. We want to show how we can love God, to love others, and to make disciples who can continue to do the same.

fields.name: ‚ùÑ Rules ‚ùÑ
fields.value: We love because he first loved us. - *1 John 4:19*

fields.name: üî• Admins üî•
fields.value: Need help? Feel free to message anyone with the **Podcast Host** or **Podcaster** role!

fields.name: üåø Enjoy! üåø
fields.value: Thanks for coming! We hope you'll listen to our podcasts and stick around to hear about what you have to say. Questions or suggestions? Feel free to provide those as well.
